    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"

>
[Wide Overwatch](/Feats.aspx?ID=3122) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 51</row>

**Archetype** [Overwatch](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=109)

**Prerequisites**
[Overwatch Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3118); master in Perception

</column>

---

Through a variety of perceptive techniques, careful routines, and upgrades to your enhanced visual gear, you have become able to observe and maintain your overwatch at a much greater distance. Increase the size of your overwatch field from 30 feet to 60 feet.
name: Wide Overwatch
